GSD.product_version: versions from v3.19 to before v5.10.137
GSD.description:
regulator: of: Fix refcount leak bug in of_get_regulation_constraints()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.137 by commit 332e555dca074c4eb2084898021c3676423814c3, it was introduced in version v3.19 by commit 40e20d68bb3fb1ce2704c886d597918988d3321d. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: regulator: of: Fix refcount leak bug in of_get_regulation_constraints()
